txt.en:
'You turn a blind eye to a corner of this region for just a moment and something momentous happens that you missed. Somehow, with all of our focus on the tomb raiders and bandits in the south, a scouting force from Angmar has slipped into one of the ruins.

'This is a disaster for us on several fronts. Something here is of enough value for Angmar to send a force to find it. Something that we do not yet know of ourselves. If they were to find something it could tip the tides of war. Not to mention what could happen if they find the refuge of Tinnudir. If they use that to somehow find Esteldin... I cannot entertain those thoughts.

'We must discover the intent of this scouting force and determine if more are following them. This must be done with posthaste. No delay can be afforded.'

'I have talked with the others and gone over what you found. There is indeed a force coming to Evendim but there are two things we have in our advantage.

'First, they will take a while to get here, giving us needed time for preparations. Second, they are headed for Annuminas, a battleground no-one knows better than we.

'We must get the rest of Evendim in order before they arrive. There are several other threats and issues we must resolve, for once they are here, war will come with them.'
'We must know what Angmar wants with Tham Ornen lest we risk losing everything.'
Tham Ornen has been occupied by forces from Angmar. What value they see in the ruins is unknown.
Nadfaron, Brogdagnir and Gúrhebnir are all at  Tinnudir.\n\nOrchalwë has asked you to work with three of the other rangers to discover Angmar's intent in Tham Ornen.
Orchalwë is at Tinnudir.\n\nOrchalwë will be interested to hear what you discovered within Tham Ornen.
